@DeadbyDaylight Just got the legion mystery box from you guys. Not worth the 49.99 price tag and i dont know who came up with the 70.00 value claim, but this is like 20-30 tops.  My mask has a large defect in it as well.    What happened? https://t.co/dJMxv0Zpqb

What I expect for the price would of been a keychain of the perk (not wood cutout), a metal or ceramic mask  at maybe a 1:10 size (not rubber) and an ID badge with the ID being made out of plastic, not paper.  Im fine with the mix tape and the sticker.  Listen said it was valued at 70 bucks.  This is no 70.00.

100%, just got it and posted pics and @ed them.  Very disappointed in the quality of the items vs the price I paid.  My mask has a large crease in it at the mouth. Even if it was a small 1:10 metal/ceramic mask i would of been more happier then what I got.  Even the little wood cut out could of been a keychain!

Got my mystery box from @deadbydaylight.  Cool items but not worth the price tag.  Maybe 20-30 bucks.  I was hoping for a nice mask statue and some fancy looking props for my desk.  What i got was a rubber mask that’s has a bad crease in it, a wooden cutout of a perk, a tape, a paper I’d badge and a https://t.co/Lby92opqN7 Sorry but super disappointed in the quality that I paid for.
